successes.title: Fate Core
successes.description: Characters live at the core of Fate! Fate Core is the latest edition of Evil Hat Productions' popular Fate roleplaying game system.

Pledges.description: ACCESS: At this level, you get early access to the Fate Core draft text, immediately -- before the kickstarter campaign even concludes!
EXPANSIONS: Same as the ACCESS level, plus you'll get electronic copies of all the expansions funded by this kickstarter campaign.

ACCELERATE (USA): A physical copy of Fate Accelerated Edition, plus everything in the EXPANSIONS level. Add $5 for each additional copy of the book. Limit of 9 additional copies per pledge (total 10).

CARRIE'S FRIENDS (USA and International): Get the EXPANSIONS tier, plus a softcover of Carrie Harris's Sally Slick and the Steel Syndicate novel when it ships towards the end of the year. Add up to 5 extra novels to your shipment for $15 each.

ACCELERATE (International): A physical copy of Fate Accelerated Edition, plus everything in the EXPANSIONS level. Add $5 for each additional copy of the book. Limit of 9 additional copies per pledge (total 10).

THE BOOK: Once the art and layout are finalized, you'll be the first to get Fate Core as a physical book, as well as a kickstarter-exclusive Fate Core bookmark, and everything in the EXPANSIONS level. Add $25 for each additional copy of the book (each with a bookmark). Limit of 5 additional copies per pledge (total 6).

THE BOOK (USA): Once the art and layout are finalized, you'll be the first to get Fate Core as a physical book, as well as a kickstarter-exclusive Fate Core bookmark, and everything in the EXPANSIONS level. Add $25 for each additional copy of the book (each with a bookmark). Limit of 5 additional copies per pledge (total 6).

THE BOOK (International): Once the art and layout are finalized, you'll be the first to get Fate Core as a physical book, as well as a kickstarter-exclusive Fate Core bookmark, and everything in the EXPANSIONS level. Add $25 for each additional copy of the book (each with a bookmark). Limit of 5 additional copies per pledge (total 6).

FRED'S INK: You'll get everything in THE BOOK level, and Fred will personalize your copy of the game. Strictly a prestige item! Add $30 for each additional signed book you'd like to include, or $25 for each additional unsigned book without dice. Limit of 5 additional books of either type per pledge.

STRANGE SOLO (USA and International): Get the EXPANSIONS tier, plus a physical copy of Jess Nevins's massive Strange Tales of the Century supplement when it ships around late Summer. Add up to 5 extra copies of Strange Tales to your shipment for $40 each.

FRED'S STASH: Fred has a pile of loose Fudge dice from both the Wizard Dice set that Evil Hat produced, and the Olympic Dice set that Grey Ghost Games produced. Back at this level and you'll get four dice of one color, color randomly selected from what's available. You'll also get everything in THE BOOK level, and Fred will personalize your copy of the game. Add $35 for each additional signed-book-and-4-dice set you'd like to include, or $25 for each additional unsigned book without dice. Limit of 5 additional books of either type per pledge.

GADGETEER (USA): Get Fate Core and the Fate System Toolkit shipped to you when both books are ready, plus everything in the EXPANSIONS level. Add $5 to get Fate Core shipped right away, and wait on the Toolkit.

FOUR CORE FOR YOUR STORE: If you operate a friendly local gaming store, this level gets you four copies of the book for your shelves. Add $25 for every two additional copies you want to receive. A $5 flat shipping fee is included and won't change regardless of how many copies you choose. This tier is available only to confirmed retailers with a USA-based shipping address. Collect the email addresses of your preordering customers and provide those to us when we survey you at the end of the campaign, and we'll make sure they get all of the digital rewards too.

GADGETEER (International): Get Fate Core and the Fate System Toolkit shipped to you when both books are ready, plus everything in the EXPANSIONS level. Add $15 to get Fate Core shipped right away, and wait on the Toolkit.

EXPLORER (USA): Get Fate Core and Fate Worlds shipped to you when both books are ready, plus everything in the EXPANSIONS level. Add $5 to get Fate Core shipped right away, and wait on the Worlds book.

EXPLORER (International): Get Fate Core and Fate Worlds shipped to you when both books are ready, plus everything in the EXPANSIONS level. Add $15 to get Fate Core shipped right away, and wait on the Worlds book.

TRIO (USA): Get Fate Core, the Fate System Toolkit, and the Fate Worlds book shipped to you when all three books are ready. Add $5 to get Fate Core shipped right away, and wait on the others; add $10 instead if you want all three titles shipped individually as available.

QUARTET (USA): Get Fate Core, the Fate System Toolkit, the Fate Worlds book, and the Fate Accelerated Edition book shipped to you when all four books are ready. Add $5 for each additional shipment you want made beyond the first (to split things up for fastest delivery). As with all the other physical book levels, the EXPANSIONS reward is included.

TRIO (International): Get Fate Core, the Fate System Toolkit, and the Fate Worlds book shipped to you when all three books are ready. Add $15 to get Fate Core shipped right away, and wait on the others; add $30 instead if you want all three titles shipped individually as available.

QUARTET (International): Get Fate Core, the Fate System Toolkit, the Fate Worlds book, and the Fate Accelerated Edition book shipped to you when all four books are ready. Add $15 for each additional shipment you want made beyond the first (to split things up for fastest delivery). As with all the other physical book levels, the EXPANSIONS reward is included.

QUINTET (USA): Get Fate Core, the Fate System Toolkit, the Fate Worlds books, the Fate Accelerated Edition book, and the Sally Slick novel shipped to you when all four books are ready. Add $5 for each additional shipment you want made beyond the first (to split things up for fastest delivery) -- with the novel coming at the end of the year, you'll probably want at least one separate shipment! As with all the other physical book levels, the EXPANSIONS reward is included.

QUINTET (International): Get Fate Core, the Fate System Toolkit, the Fate Worlds books, the Fate Accelerated Edition book, and the Sally Slick novel shipped to you when all four books are ready. Add $15 for each additional shipment you want made beyond the first (to split things up for fastest delivery) -- with the novel coming at the end of the year, you'll probably want at least one separate shipment! As with all the other physical book levels, the EXPANSIONS reward is included.

STRANGE QUINTET (USA): Get Fate Core, the Fate System Toolkit, the Fate Worlds books, the Fate Accelerated Edition book, and Strange Tales of the Century shipped to you when all five titles are ready. Add $5 for each additional shipment you want made beyond the first (to split things up for fastest delivery) -- you'll probably want at least one separate shipment! As with all the other physical book levels, the EXPANSIONS reward is included.

STRANGE QUINTET (International): Get Fate Core, the Fate System Toolkit, the Fate Worlds books, the Fate Accelerated Edition book, and Strange Tales of the Century shipped to you when all five titles are ready. Add $15 for each additional shipment you want made beyond the first (to split things up for fastest delivery) -- you'll probably want at least one separate shipment! As with all the other physical book levels, the EXPANSIONS reward is included.

SEXTET (USA): Get Fate Core, the Fate System Toolkit, the Fate Worlds books, the Fate Accelerated Edition book, Strange Tales of the Century, and Sally Slick and the Steel Syndicate shipped to you when all six titles are ready. Add $5 for each additional shipment you want made beyond the first (to split things up for fastest delivery) -- you'll probably want at least one separate shipment! As with all the other physical book levels, the EXPANSIONS reward is included.

SEXTET (International): Get Fate Core, the Fate System Toolkit, the Fate Worlds books, the Fate Accelerated Edition book, Strange Tales of the Century, and Sally Slick and the Steel Syndicate shipped to you when all six titles are ready. Add $15 for each additional shipment you want made beyond the first (to split things up for fastest delivery) -- you'll probably want at least one separate shipment! As with all the other physical book levels, the EXPANSIONS reward is included.
CONSULTATION, NO DICE: Same as the CONSULTATION level (see below), minus the dice.

CONSULTATION: Got a particular thing you want to do with Fate Core for your home game? We'll pair your ideas with an expert at Evil Hat who will help you sort out your Fate Core implementation for your home game, and will also write up to 2000 words so you'll have an official reference document to work from. You'll also get everything in the FRED'S STASH reward level and then some -- we'll send you 4 dice of EACH color available. If you want more books in your shipment, add amounts as shown on the FRED'S STASH level.
